events.name: Smuckers Taste Testing
events.description: Our friendly nieghborhood Smuckers loves to invite orrville residents to taste test their newest products! Earn $10 to come participate and provide your feedback to them!

events.name: Johnson Woods
events.description: Enjoy a relaxing hike with your family through the woods! Johnson Woods is a beautiful mile long hike right outside of Orrville.

events.name: 4th of July Fireworks
events.description: Don't miss our famous firework celebration for the 4th of July! Guests from all over the state come for our spectacular display!.

events.name: Orrville Parade
events.description: Every summer a parade comes through town with all sorts of fun for parents and kids alike. Bring your baskets because there will be lots of candy!.

events.name: Orr Pool
events.description: Orr pool is an excellent way to cool off on a hot summer day. Families with kidos of all ages can have fun together at our amazing city pool!

events.name: Orr Park
events.description: Equiped with pickle ball, basketball, baseball, and all the popular sports; Orr park is a top choice for local residents! We have playgrounds and all sorts of fun trails.

events.name: Orrville Historical Society
events.description: The Orrville historical society offers fasinating tours of our towns great history! They also hold their own events throughout the year.

events.name: 3D Printing Classes
events.description: Our favorite professors from the University of Akron's Wayne College hold 3D printing classes for rising creators! You and your kids are all able to learn how to 3D print.
